Servers

Element.io & Matrix

mrghorm.com hosts a Matrix homeserver and Element.io web app.

To join, please visit https://element.mrghorm.com

Alternatively, login to matrix.mrghorm.com from any Matrix client. The post popular Matrix client, Element.io, can be found here.

Click "Edit" in the Homeserver section of the client, and change it to https://matrix.mrghorm.com

Wow link test!

Mumble

mrghorm.com hosts a Mumble VoiP server

Credentials: Address: mumble.mrghorm.com Port: 64738
